species.name: electrode
descriptions: Electrode eats electricity in the atmosphere. On days when lightning strikes, you can see this Pokémon exploding all over the place from eating too much electricity.
It explodes in response to even minor stimuli. It is feared, with the nickname of “The Bomb Ball.”
It is dangerous. If it has too much electricity and has nothing to do, it amuses itself by exploding.
It is known to drift on winds if it is bloated to bursting with stored electricity.
It stores an overflowing amount of electric energy inside its body. Even a small shock makes it explode.

abilities.name: static
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of paralyzing attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: aftermath
abilities.effect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.
